Set-up
```{r}
library(lme4)
library(dplyr)
library(broom.mixed)
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

Load data
```{r}
edustats <- read_csv("Data/DataFigure2/w1118EdU.csv")
```

```{r}
edustats <- edustats %>%
  mutate(
    Weeks = factor(Weeks, levels = c(1, 6))
  )

edu_pois <- glmer(
  EdU ~ Weeks + (1 | N),
  data = edustats,
  family = poisson(link = "log")
)

glmm_tidy <- tidy(
  edu_pois,
  effects = "fixed",
  conf.int = FALSE
)

week6_row <- glmm_tidy %>%
  filter(term == "Weeks6")

p_val <- week6_row$p.value

stars <- case_when(
  p_val < 0.001 ~ "***",
  p_val < 0.01  ~ "**",
  p_val < 0.05  ~ "*",
  TRUE          ~ "ns"
)

poisson_edu <- data.frame(
  comparison = "6 Weeks",
  model = "Poisson_GLMM",
  estimate_logRR = week6_row$estimate,
  p_value = p_val,
  stars = stars
)

print(poisson_edu)
```

```{r}
write.csv(
  poisson_edu,
  file = "Results/ResultsFigure2/StatsEdUPoisson.csv",
  row.names = FALSE
)
```
